HTMLTextAreaElementSelectionchange_event.summary:
The selectionchange event of the Selection API is fired when the text selection within an textarea element is changed.
This includes both changes in the selected range of characters, or if the caret moves.

remarks.para: The event is usually processed by adding an event listener on the {{HTMLElement("textarea")}}, and in the handler function read by the selectionStart, selectionEnd and selectionDirection properties.

It is also possible to add a listener on the global onselectionchange event handler, and within the handler function use to get the . However this is not very useful for getting changes to text selections.
